trans-unit.source: Represents the change to a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> for dynamic updates.
trans-unit.target: 表示若要變更<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>進行動態更新。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used by a tracking service to determine which RuleSets have been changed during a dynamic update.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別可以用追蹤服務來判斷在動態更新期間已變更的 Ruleset。

trans-unit.source: An instance of this object will be generated for every RuleSet that existed before the dynamic update and remains afterwards, and has changes applied to one or more rules.
trans-unit.target: 每個規則集的動態更新之前就已存在之後繼續留下，以及變更套用至一或多個規則，將會產生此物件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedRuleSetAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedRuleSetAction"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedRuleSetAction"></xref> class by using the original and the updated <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedRuleSetAction"></xref>使用原始和更新的類別<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The original <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 原始<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The updated <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已更新<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The RuleSetDefinition or updatedRuleSetDefinition is null
trans-unit.target: RuleSetDefinition 或 updatedRuleSetDefinition 為 null

trans-unit.source: The names of the two RuleSets are not the same
trans-unit.target: 兩個 Ruleset 的名稱不相同

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the original <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定原始<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property is settable so that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedRuleSetAction> class can be deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是可設定使<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedRuleSetAction>類別可以還原序列化。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedRuleSetAction>

trans-unit.source: There should be no need to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 應該不需要設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Changing it during a dynamic update might lead to unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 動態更新期間變更它可能會導致非預期的結果。

trans-unit.source: The original <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 原始<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The original <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 原始<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>為 null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得名稱<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the updated <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定更新<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property is settable so that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedRuleSetAction> class can be deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是可設定使<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedRuleSetAction>類別可以還原序列化。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedRuleSetAction>

trans-unit.source: There should be no need to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 應該不需要設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Changing it during a dynamic update might lead to unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 動態更新期間變更它可能會導致非預期的結果。

trans-unit.source: The updated <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已更新<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The updated <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 已更新<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>為 null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。
